# alicloud\_cloud\_storage\_gateway\_express\_sync\_share\_attachment

Provides a Cloud Storage Gateway Express Sync Share Attachment resource.

For information about Cloud Storage Gateway Express Sync Share Attachment and how to use it, see [What is Express Sync Share Attachment](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/doc-detail/53972.htm).

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.144.0+.

## Example Usage

Basic Usage

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.alicloud as alicloud
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        # Terraform Variables are not always the best fit for getting inputs in the context of Terraform CDK.
        #     You can read more about this at https://cdk.tf/variables
        name = cdktf.TerraformVariable(self, "name",
            default="tftest"
        )
        region = cdktf.TerraformVariable(self, "region",
            default="cn-shanghai"
        )
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_storage_bundle_default =
        alicloud.cloud_storage_gateway_storage_bundle.CloudStorageGatewayStorageBundle(self, "default",
            storage_bundle_name=name.string_value
        )
        alicloud_oss_bucket_default = alicloud.oss_bucket.OssBucket(self, "default_3",
            bucket=name.string_value
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_oss_bucket_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_vpc_vpc = alicloud.vpc.Vpc(self, "vpc",
            cidr_block="192.16.0.0/12",
            vpc_name=name.string_value
        )
        data_alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_stocks_default =
        alicloud.data_alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_stocks.DataAlicloudCloudStorageGatewayStocks(self, "default_5",
            gateway_class="Standard"
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        data_alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_stocks_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_vswitch_default = alicloud.vswitch.Vswitch(self, "default_6",
            cidr_block="192.16.0.0/21",
            vpc_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_vpc_vpc.id),
            vswitch_name=name.string_value,
            zone_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(
                cdktf.property_access(data_alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_stocks_default.stocks, ["0", "zone_id"]))
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_vswitch_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_default =
        alicloud.cloud_storage_gateway_gateway.CloudStorageGatewayGateway(self, "default_7",
            description="tf-acctestDesalone",
            gateway_class="Standard",
            gateway_name=name.string_value,
            location="Cloud",
            payment_type="PayAsYouGo",
            public_network_bandwidth=10,
            release_after_expiration=True,
            storage_bundle_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_storage_bundle_default.id),
            type="File",
            vswitch_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_vswitch_default.id)
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_cache_disk_default =
        alicloud.cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_cache_disk.CloudStorageGatewayGatewayCacheDisk(self, "default_8",
            cache_disk_category="cloud_efficiency",
            cache_disk_size_in_gb=50,
            gateway_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_default.id)
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_cache_disk_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_file_share_default =
        alicloud.cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_file_share.CloudStorageGatewayGatewayFileShare(self, "default_9",
            backend_limit=0,
            cache_mode="Cache",
            fe_limit=0,
            gateway_file_share_name=name.string_value,
            gateway_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_default.id),
            lag_period=5,
            local_path=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_cache_disk_default.local_file_path),
            oss_bucket_name=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_oss_bucket_default.bucket),
            oss_endpoint=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_oss_bucket_default.extranet_endpoint),
            protocol="NFS",
            remote_sync=False,
            squash="none"
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_file_share_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync_default =
        alicloud.cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync.CloudStorageGatewayExpressSync(self, "default_10",
            bucket_name=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_file_share_default.oss_bucket_name),
            bucket_region=region.string_value,
            description=name.string_value,
            express_sync_name=name.string_value
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync_default.override_logical_id("default")
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync_share_attachment_default =
        alicloud.cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync_share_attachment.CloudStorageGatewayExpressSyncShareAttachment(self, "default_11",
            express_sync_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync_default.id),
            gateway_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_default.id),
            share_name=cdktf.Token.as_string(alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_gateway_file_share_default.gateway_file_share_name)
        )
        # This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.
        alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync_share_attachment_default.override_logical_id("default")
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `express_sync_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the ExpressSync.
* `gateway_id` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the Gateway.
* `share_name` - (Required, ForceNew) The name of the GatewayFileShare. **NOTE:** When GatewayFileShare is associated with a speed sync group, its reverse synchronization function will be turned off by default.


## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported:

* `id` - The resource ID in terraform of Express Sync Share Attachment. The value is formate as <express_sync_id>:<gateway_id>:<share_name>.

### Timeouts

The `timeouts` block allows you to specify [timeouts](https://www.terraform.io/docs/configuration-0-11/resources.html#timeouts) for certain actions:

* `create` - (Defaults to 5 mins) Used when create the Express Sync Share Attachment.
* `delete` - (Defaults to 5 mins) Used when delete the Express Sync Share Attachment.

## Import

Cloud Storage Gateway Express Sync Share Attachment can be imported using the id, e.g.

```shell
$ terraform import alicloud_cloud_storage_gateway_express_sync_share_attachment.example <express_sync_id>:<gateway_id>:<share_name>
```
